direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods check for the presence of a specific attribute or content (text) within the elements.
Both methods check for the presence of a specific attribute (class) or content (text) within the elements.
Both methods evaluate elements based on a given condition (selector or text presence).
The 'select' method is used to filter elements based on a query, which can be related to the text presence check in 'hasText'.
The 'filter' method in NodeTraversor can be used to filter nodes based on text presence, similar to 'hasText'.
